unnormalised: Last month, I took a road trip from Delhi to Jaipur. Started at 6 AM sharp, hoping to beat the traffic. The NH48 was surprisingly decent until Gurgaon. Post that, it was a total mess, took us almost 3 hrs to cross. Had a quick breakfast at a dhaba near Manesar, paid Rs. 300 for 2 parathas and chai. Reached Jaipur by 2:30 PM, pretty exhausted! Next time, I'm taking the train; that 5 hr journey seems much better than this 8+ hr ordeal.
normalised: Last month, I took a road trip from Delhi to Jaipur. Started at six A-M sharp, hoping to beat the traffic. The N-H fourty eight was surprisingly decent until Gurgaon. Post that, it was a total mess, took us almost three hours to cross. Had a quick breakfast at a dhaba near Manesar, paid rupee three hundred for two parathas and chai. Reached Jaipur by two thirty P-M, pretty exhausted! Next time, I am taking the train; that five hour journey seems much better than this eight plus hour ordeal.
